name: BetterUI
description: Anniversary Update Support! Various UI improvements like ordered items with multiple ways of sorting, DPSMeter, Item Counters, Skill/Equipment/Item Information, Command/Scrapper counters and other improvements, customizable StatsDisplay, and much more.
